main event: Three unidentified flying objects were observed in Shaker Heights, Ohio on July 3, 1967.
interesting points: The objects were approximately 15 feet in diameter.
The duration of the observation was not reported.
The objects were of different colors.
The observers contacted the authorities, but they were unable to provide an explanation.
The Air Force requested that the observers complete a UFO reporting form for further evaluation.
witnesses: civilian observers, including the letter writer and their brother
